title: hierba - English translation – Linguee
description: Many translated example sentences containing "hierba" – English-Spanish dictionary and search engine for English translations.
text:
▾Dictionary Spanish-English
[hierba](/spanish-english/translation/hierba.html) noun, feminine [colloq.]—
[weed](/english-spanish/translation/weed.html) n
Fumar hierba es ilegal en este país. — Smoking weed is illegal in this country.
[pot](/english-spanish/translation/pot.html) n [colloq.]
Fumar hierba es legal en algunos países. — Smoking pot is legal in certain countries.
[bud](/english-spanish/translation/bud.html)AE n [colloq.]
La policía encontró una bolsa de hierba en el automóvil del hombre. — The police found a bag of bud in the man's car.
less common:
[dope](/english-spanish/translation/dope.html)n [colloq.]
Examples:
[hierba seca](/spanish-english/translation/hierba+seca.html) f— [hierba cortada](/spanish-english/translation/hierba+cortada.html) f— [hierba gatera](/spanish-english/translation/hierba+gatera.html) f— [briznas de hierba](/spanish-english/translation/briznas+de+hierba.html) pl f— [capa de hierba](/spanish-english/translation/capa+de+hierba.html) f— [recortes de hierba](/spanish-english/translation/recortes+de+hierba.html) pl m—
